name: Hidden Objects: Coastal Hill Mystery
storyline:
Coastal Hill, a small snug town by the sea, has always been the most restful spot in the district. You return here to visit home grounds. After pulling into the town, you realize everything has changed completely… 
 
But, wait! How’s that possible? A windmill, an airship, carts… The town seems to look like ages ago! Streets are filled with strange fog or something weird, stuff from different times is scattered around… 
 
What’s happened to the people here? What’s going on? You’ll have to find it out and unravel the mystery of the beloved town in this gripping hidden object game.
summary:
Coastal HIll: Dark Legends is a detective hidden object game that features character customization and monster fighting mechanic. 
 
What would it feel like to return to your hometown and not recognize it at all? The lighthouse town you once knew as a peaceful spot has changed completely. Some forces of darkness have shrouded this place. The town has started to lose hope and it’s up to you to find all of the hidden clues and solve the mystery.
